member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.WebPFormat
member.summary: Provides the necessary information to support webp images. Adapted from by Jose M. Pi√±eiro

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.WebPFormat.Save(System.IO.Stream,System.Drawing.Image,System.Int64,System.Nullable{ImageQuality})
member.summary: Saves the current image to the specified output stream.
member.param: The to save the image information to.
The color depth in number of bits per pixel to save the image with.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.Initializer
member.summary: This class is responsible for registering the WebPImageProcessorExtender in the ObjectFactory on application start.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods
member.summary: Provides access to unmanaged native methods.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods.WebPGetInfo(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Validate the WebP image header and retrieve the image height and width. Pointers *width and *height can be passed NULL if deemed irrelevant
member.param: This is the size of the memory block pointed to by data containing the image data
The width range is limited currently from 1 to 16383
The height range is limited currently from 1 to 16383
member.returns: 1 if success, otherwise error code returned in the case of (a) formatting error(s).

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods.WebPDecodeBGRAInto(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decode WEBP image pointed to by *data and returns BGR samples into a pre-allocated buffer
member.param: This is the size of the memory block pointed to by data containing the image data
member.returns: output_buffer if function succeeds; NULL otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods.WebPEncodeLosslessBGRA(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Lossless encoding of images pointed to by *data in WebP format
member.param: The width range is limited currently from 1 to 16383
The height range is limited currently from 1 to 16383

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods.WebPEncodeLossyBGRA(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Lossy encoding images pointed to by *data in WebP format.
member.param: The width range is limited currently from 1 to 16383.
The height range is limited currently from 1 to 16383.
Ranges from 0 (lower quality) to 100 (highest quality). Controls the loss and quality during compression.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Libraries.WebP.NativeMethods.WebPFree(System.IntPtr)
member.returns: 1 if success, otherwise error code returned in the case of (a) error(s).
